title: XDM Consent
description: An XDM Consent is a representation of the consent responses given by end users/consumers of a given brand to allow or not allow the Brand/Customers to use their personal data for analytics purposes like Direct Marketing, First Party personalization, cross device profile consolidation, advertsing, sending offers etc..

Id.title: Id
Id.description: The unique identifier of the identity associated with this record.

Ttl.title: Time to Live
Ttl.description: The date and time this entry is valid until.

ConsentTimestamp.title: Consent Timestamp
ConsentTimestamp.description: The date and time the snapshot of consent assertions was taken.

ConsentSignal.title: Consent Signal
ConsentSignal.description: User consent signal for a purpose within a given consent stack.
